alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 1:57PM CST until March 05 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Eminence affecting Shannon County. .Heavy rainfall received last night and earlier today will cause the Jacks Fork River to rise above flood stage at Eminence. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Jacks Fork at Eminence. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, low lying areas including the Rivers Edge Lodge and canoe rental locations in Eminence flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 12.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
